owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

environment_ids.description: The list of environment ids to approve or reject

state.description: Whether to approve or reject deployment to the specified environments.

comment.description: A comment to accompany the deployment review
